dct_title_s: BCN arquitectura : 473 obres de la Barcino romana al 22@ = BCN architecture : 473 works from Roman Barcino to 22@
dct_description_sm: Oriented with north toward the upper right. On verso: 473 buildings are listed and located by period, author index alphabetized. Includes photographs. On verso: Insets (1:10,000) located on recto: 1) Eixample -- 2) Ciutat Vella -- 3) Diagonal Mar.
dct_publisher_sm: Barcelona : COAC Col-legi d'Arquitectes de Catalunya, 2011.
